channel.title: Welcome to MBO. on Hinode
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to MBO. on Hinode

item.title: Intro
item.description:
Welcome to Math & Beyond Outreach: Embark on a Journey of Discovery and Mastery

In the vast universe of knowledge, mathematics serves as both a guiding star and a foundational pillar. It is a language that transcends cultures, a tool that unlocks the mysteries of the universe, and an art form that celebrates logic and creativity. Welcome to “Math & Beyond Outreach,” where we embark on an exhilarating journey through the captivating world of mathematics and its boundless applications.

item.title: simultaneous linear equations reading
item.description:
2x+y=105x+2y=24 \begin{align} 2x + y &= 10 \tag{1} \\ 5x + 2y &= 24 \tag{2} \end{align}

The elimination method is when you eliminate one variable, solve for the other one, then solve for the one you eliminated. You can multiply one equation by a number to eliminate a variable. The substitution method is when you substitute a variable with an expression. Personally, I only do substitution if a variable is already isolated.

item.title: Cookie Policy
item.description:
Effective Date 19-Sep-2024

What are cookies?  

This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them, the types of cookies we use i.e, the information we collect using cookies and how that information is used, and how to manage the cookie settings.

Cookies are small text files that are used to store small pieces of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded on your browser. These cookies help us make the website function properly, make it more secure, provide better user experience, and understand how the website performs and to analyze what works and where it needs improvement.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Effective Date 19-Sep-2024

This Privacy Policy describes the policies of gethinode.com on the collection, use and disclosure of your information that we collect when you use our website ( https://gethinode.com  , referred to as the “Service”). By accessing or using the Service, you are consenting to the collection, use and disclosure of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not consent to the same, please do not access or use the Service.
